summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Tambola game application. All backend APIs (15/15) and frontend features working perfectly. Tested complete user flow (login → browse → select tickets → book → view tickets) and admin flow (create game → generate tickets → start game → confirm bookings → live control). WhatsApp booking integration (mocked) working correctly.
passed_tests: Authentication endpoints (session exchange, get user, logout)
Game management (create, get all, get specific, start, end)
Ticket generation (600 tickets per game with valid Tambola format)
Booking system (create booking, get my bookings, get booking tickets)
Admin endpoints (get all bookings, confirm bookings)
Live game functionality (start game, call numbers, get session)
Profile management (update name and avatar)
Dashboard displays live and upcoming games correctly
Game details page with prize breakdown
Ticket selection modal with pagination and multi-select
WhatsApp booking flow (creates booking and opens share dialog)
My Tickets page showing bookings with status
Profile page avatar selection and name editing
Admin panel - create game, generate tickets, start game
Admin panel - confirm pending bookings
Live game screen with current number display and auto-marking
Admin live control - call numbers sequentially
Protected routes redirect to login when not authenticated
Bottom navigation between pages
Session management and cookie-based authentication
